website_summaries.verdict: Just big enough without being too big. Holds larger mats and many other extras, too – just not blocks.
pros: Fits most mats up to 26" with some extras, but not yoga blocks
Adjustable shoulder strap, with hands-free design
Expandable front compartment, with mesh zippered inside pocket
Durable material with ventilation eyelet to keep bag dry and fresh
cons: Will not hold 26" mat and yoga blocks, but can fit almost anything else in it

customer_reviews.title: nice bag, but the zipper hole is too small
customer_reviews.text: Great material, great color, my only issue is that the zipper should be a little longer. I bought it so I don't damage my mat. (the 5mm reversable mat from Lululemon) But the hole is just a little too small to make getting the mat in or out easy. It seems like I'm rubbing my mat on the zipper too much and forceing it in. Maybe with a less sticky mat, it would be better, but the Lulu grips so much it makes it tough. I will probably be looking for another bag in the near future as this one is already getting to be a pain.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy G.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for storage!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this bag!! It holds my Manduka X-mat with room to spare. I can also fit my jacket and my fit kicks in the main compartment. The interior pockets great for personal items. And the ectetior pocket is big enough for my money, keys, glasses and more! The adjustable strap is the perfect length and comfortable to carry. The vents are a plus. I love this bag and have recommended it to my friends. I'm extremely happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: MBC

customer_reviews.title: Bad design, hard to fit 26" wide mats
customer_reviews.text: I have a Manduka Pro mat 26"x85" 6 mm (5.5" roll diameter) and it is very difficult to fit despite the bag being long enough (28") and wide enough (8") due to the narrow top opening. Zipper should extend through one of the bag side faces like in many other designs to make it easier. Did not realize the extra 2" would not allow for easy load/unload. I do not want to buy the extra large bag (29"x11") or YogaAddict Supreme bag (30") because don't want a saggy huge bag or needless pockets. I guess will need to return it and buy something else. Material seems durable.
customer_reviews.author: Roman

customer_reviews.title: Fits Jade Fusion mat and more!
customer_reviews.text: Bag is very pretty, fits my Jade Fusion mat which is amazing! It also fit my strap, my two blocks and even a thin blanket. Plenty of room - this bag is big! A little bigger than I imagined, but I didn’t draw out exact measurements so it is accurate to what the seller describes. My only gripe is the material of the bag. It feels a little cheap and I do wonder how long it will last. However, that is pure speculation and it truly is a nice bag, especially since it fits my thick fusion mat! Wish they had more print options.
customer_reviews.author: Liana Kurka

customer_reviews.title: Nice, simple mat bag.
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a simple bag to carry my yoga mat to and from practice. This bag fits my extra long (82 inch) mat easily and has extra space inside for a towel and water bottle. There are also a few zippered pockets where I keep my phone and keys during class. The bag has a nice quality feeling to it, but I can't attest to its durability yet as I've only been using it for a few months. Compared the prices I've seen for similar bags though, this is an excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: GetOutside2121

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this yoga bag and in a few days, the zipper to the side pocket broke. I returned the product and asked for a replacement which was sent quickly but the replacement also got ripped at the seam. It is a nice design and I like the size but unfortunately, it is poorly made. Don't waste your money or time and look for something else...
customer_reviews.author: Junichi Koyama

customer_reviews.title: Great Yoga Bag
customer_reviews.text: I received my yoga bag in a timely manner and absolutely love it! The bag is roomy and thankfully, fit my 26-1/2" wide yoga mat with a little room to spare. I like the small mesh bag inside for storing keys, lip gloss, etc. and the zippered pouch on the outside is handy for a small towel, cellphone, or any item that you might want to take with you that would fit into it. There are small openings for air circulation inside the bag which it a plus. I wouldn't hesitate to purchase this bag and for the price the quality is definitely there!
customer_reviews.author: Patience

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag useful can put all set 7 kits of Yoga
customer_reviews.text: I am happy when recieved this bag, it is made of fabric so I think it will Durable, Spacious with small compartment inside for wallet and small outside compartment for phone and some things. I can put all my Yoga 7 piece Set in it so fit. now I can bring them every where for do Yoga. YOu should buy it for YOur yoga 7 piece Set The Seller so friendly always contact me via email to ask me about it. I will tell my friends buy it Thanks Seller
customer_reviews.author: Tran Thi Thu Huong

customer_reviews.title: Broke upon second use
customer_reviews.text: The bag is nicely roomy, so as I was packing up to check out of my hotel room I added some lightweight items (tissue packs, so very lightweight) in the carrier, and the zipper broke immediately, and this was only the second time ever using it. I like the design of the bag, because it did give some extra capacity for holding a little extra besides a mat during travel, but it has zero durability.
customer_reviews.author: R. Anguin

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag
customer_reviews.text: I have a Sivan fitness mat that is 71" long x 24" wide and 1/2" thick. I needed a bag that would accommodate the width when rolled up and thickness. This bag definitely does just that and I still have extra room to spare. There are two pockets, one inside and one outside that are plenty big enough to hold keys, phone, protein bars or whatever small items you need to bring with you. I love this bag. It is sturdy and durable and would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: 6119_cat

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal--Bigger than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Read reviews for many yoga bags. Decided on this because it was available in XL. It has more space than I expected. My 64 x24" mat & 2 blocks fit with plenty of room to spare. Enough room for a change of clothes, an extra mat, or a blanket for meditation. It is made well. Front pocket is roomy as well since it is not flat against the fabric, it allows for a variety of items to store. I put my strap inn the front pocket. Was delighted with the color--it coordinates with my mat & blocks. Extremely satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: SLT

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I fit the yoga mat (thick yoga mat used in hot yoga), mat towel (larger to cover the mat in hot yoga), several sweat towels, a yoga block, bands (several types) hair brush, face wipes and it still had room to zip. I like that when it is empty I can fold it up. Flexible for storage. Very pleased with this purchase. Plus I got it quickly.
customer_reviews.author: MelissaT

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for holding a mat, a cover and a change of clothes.
customer_reviews.text: This bag is large enough to hold an extra long mat, a hot yoga cover for the mat and an spare set of clothes. It also has a convenient pocket for keys and wallet. The only thing I would have liked to have had now that I have it is some sort of security lock for it and valuables inside. That isn't how it was advertised so that is just an extra want next time. The quality is great and I am sure I will use it for years.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Plastic strap holder broke in 3months
customer_reviews.text: Good looking bag for a fair price. Used it 1-2 times/week (gently-only for the yoga mat, no other weight) for two and half months. The plastic strap holder is broken where it swings. Poor quality plastic. Do not buy, unless you’re prepared to replace it yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Entrpnr72

customer_reviews.title: Actually big, unlike many other bags that say they are big.
customer_reviews.text: The extra large bag is big. I wanted big, it is hard to find big. This one holds my extra thick, extra long, Jade yoga mat. And easily a couple of blocks and a towel, maybe more. Nice pocket on the outside and also one on the inside. A thicker canvas. I’ve ordered several yoga bags that claim to hold a lot of stuff, they never do. This one delivers.
customer_reviews.author: E. Koonce

customer_reviews.title: Hands Down Best Yoga Mat Bag !!!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love my Yoga Bag. I did alot of research before deciding on getting the Yoga[Addict]TM Yoga Mat Bag. Having the 28" long zipper end-to end makes putting and taking out the mat easy! Having the external pouch is perfect for your trinkets and having the ventilation slots are a great addition to the bag. It is well constructed and sturdy. You definitely are getting your monies worth. The best part though is the personal message that I received from Richee. This really goes along way instead of just getting an automatic electronic response. I really appreciated it. If you are shopping for a new Yoga Mat Bag, look no further this is the best one! Namaste !
customer_reviews.author: keren k

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Bag for Yoga Mat and Props!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is perfect for my needs. It is sturdy, an attractive color, and holds everything I need for yoga with room to spare. I put in a large yoga mat, yoga blanket, two large blocks, and a strap. There is still plenty of room for purse and change of clothing if desired. My bag is the extra large 30" bag. If you don't want to carry as much as I do, you may like the 28" bag better.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: " and I absolutely love it! It was the third mat bag I ...
customer_reviews.text: I received the yoga mat bag "compact," and I absolutely love it! It was the third mat bag I ordered. The other two were too small for my mat and not nearly as well constructed as the YogaAddict bag. I ordered the light purple, and the color is so uplifting and cheery. It fits my mat perfectly with some room to spare. I can keep my headbands and hair ties in the front pocket, which would also fit much more. I'm so very pleased with the YogaAddict bag...it's not only a pretty bag, but also very functional and extremely well made! Thank you for making such a terrific bag.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Good storage bag for yoga or gym.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely room in the XL to hold what you need. I use the bag to hold my yoga mat, two yoga blocks, and a 18"x6" foam roller. All three items I carry have to be placed in a specific way but there is still room to put some other items. I use the extra space to store my coat along while I workout or run before yoga. If yoga blankets are your thing you could fit it in the bag. The little side pocket also has plenty of space. I use it to store my keys, wallet, and earbud case and there is still room to spare. The strap is good and the bag seems durable. Overall a solid choice.
customer_reviews.author: His Dudeness

customer_reviews.title: Barely fits a thick mat but great bag
customer_reviews.text: Barely fits a bigger mat. If you have a thick mat it will be the only thing that fits and you have to roll it just perfect. Was hoping for a bit more room. However if you have a regular size mat this will be perfect. I use it a few times each week and holds my mat and a towel in the zipper pocket. Wish it was a bit bigger but still works great.
customer_reviews.author: Crys

customer_reviews.title: Namaste to the Team at Yoga Addict; This Mat Bag is a Great Addition to My Practice
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag specifically for walking to yoga classes. I got tired of juggling my mat, water bottle, keys and other items while trekking around town. It's perfect; my water bottle fits in the bag with my mat and the outside pocket accommodates headband, keys and a wallet. I experienced an unanticipated bonus this morning when I drove to a class during a downpour and my mat was dry when I set up for class.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Mazin

customer_reviews.title: I found the bag to be very useful I needed something on the larger side
customer_reviews.text: I am a tall guy in I had a long mat and wider than most I Needed A larger Bag for that purpose This one fit the purpose very well Also I like the fact that I can get it in a bright color Something easy to see and most of the bags were on the feminine side But there are many colors to choose from and patterns The company is been very receptive and proactive
customer_reviews.author: Joe W.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely itchy strap
customer_reviews.text: I liked how the bag has compartments for your keys and accessories and how it has breathable holes. However, I found the strap of the bag extremely itchy. If you have sensitive skin like I do, and if you find wool extremely itchy on your skin, then you'll find the strap of this bag much more itchy than wool. I think the strap is made of the same material as burlap bags and it is not detachable. I'm returning the bag immediately!
customer_reviews.author: Julie 17

customer_reviews.title: Roomy enough for a 5mm mat
customer_reviews.text: Fits my standard length/width 5mm (extra thick) mat with room for a mat towel and hand towel. There is a small internal mesh pocket for keys or other small items. Sturdy main compartment. My only concern is that the clips that hold the strap to the main compartment are plastic and seen a bit flimsy. Overall, this is a great, roomy mat bag.
customer_reviews.author: cxx

customer_reviews.title: Get the large for a Manduke Pro 71" mat!!!
customer_reviews.text: Get the large for the Manduka Pro 71" mat. I ordered the regular and the opening is small. My mat was rubbing on the zipper. I returned the regular and got the large. The large is awesome! Plenty of room for my mat to go in and enough extra room for blocks and blanket. The material is nice and the strap is soft. This is an excellent bag! Thanks for making it!
customer_reviews.author: Syzygy

customer_reviews.title: Fits a Thick 1/2" x 71" x 24" Yoga Mat Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased an extra thick mat,  and it did not fit a standard 7" wide yoga bag. But this 8" wide product has just the perfect amount of extra width needed. Although I just purchased it, appears the material and zipper is very durable and rugged. Assume it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Graff

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand the 'Easy to drink from' rating feature, but as far has holding my yoga mat, it is perfect. I have a longer mat than most & it fits in perfectly along with a knee mat, tennis ball & belt. There is a pouch inside for your keys as well. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: usmcnsoftballmom

customer_reviews.title: Best Exercise bag I have Owned!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second bag from YogaAddict. My first bag is still working great; it is so sturdy, and I use it EVERY day! I bought a thicker exercise mat that did not fit in my previous bag. So, I HAD to find the same brand as my previous bag-definitely THE BEST exercise bag out there!!!
customer_reviews.author: Energize

customer_reviews.title: Fit my extra thick mat!
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this bag for a couple days and have taken it to Yoga once, but so far I really like this bag. It fits my extra thick mat with room for my mat towel and a water bottle. There is an exterior zipped pocket that has enough space for my phone and keys. There are vent holes on the bag and the material feels like a good sturdy canvas. So far, I'm extremely satisfied. The bag was exactly as described and I love a bright green!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda E.

customer_reviews.title: Super Yoga Mat Bag and Service
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter who is a yoga addict and work out addict. I wish I had half her energy. She loved the bag. The pouch expands out unlike some that are just sleeves with zippers with no room to put anything but a piece of paper in. The shipping was incredibly fast. At first I was concerned by the arrival date but all was fast. The seller followed up to insure it arrived on time and if it was what we wanted. It did and we are very satisfied. I highly recommend the bad and purchasing it form this vendor. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: diverdown48

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size
customer_reviews.text: This is great because i don't usually go straight to yoga, i have to go do other errands and this just makes it easier to carry my matt and towels around. I like how the strap is sturdy and strong to be able to hook other things on.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: My Yoga Buddies Were Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Great materials, very well-designed. Ample sizing for a mat, and the features (air vents, strap, pockets) are thoughtful. I got the bright green since I'm often walking in the city to and from classes at night, and it's a very cool color. I'm anticipating that it will be durable based on the quality of materials and craftsmanship. If you're thinking about it, just go ahead, it's worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M Morgan

customer_reviews.title: colorful, sturdy yoga bag is top notch
customer_reviews.text: The quality of my yoga mat bag exceeded my expectation. Beautiful colors, excellent sturdy material, exterior and interior pouches with zippers. Would highly recommend it to anyone needing a yoga bag for an extra long yoga mat.
customer_reviews.author: YoSa

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, Good Looking Gear Bag
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this bag for the past couple of weeks and am loving it. The fabric and construction is very sturdy. The bag fits all my gear--mat, towels, water bottle, etc. One inside and one outside pocket provide space for keys and other small items that would be hard to fish out of the main compartment. I highly recommend it. Also, the bag was shipped and delivered very quickly and in excellent condition. Yeah Yoga Addict!
customer_reviews.author: F.M. Ficara

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for Kali Sticks
customer_reviews.text: This bag is sturdy and very durable. I purchased this item to transport my Kali stick to-and-from the gym. It perfectly fits my boxing gloves, pads, change of clothes and, of course, Kali sticks. But not much else. Had to upgrade to a duffel bag when I started rolling in BJJ and needed to bring a Gi to class as well. The bag is still in use, just now for my wife's yoga mat (as intended by YogaAddict)!
customer_reviews.author: jp

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these for my Husband for Christmas and ended up liking it so much I bought another for myself. Capacity of bag is perfect and zippers are well made and material is heavy duty. Just enough room without being too big. Great bags!
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Fits Large Mats
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag to fit my SPRI Pro Mat 180 exercise mat. The mat is 71" L, 24" W and 5/8" thick. As you can see from the pictures, it not only fits the mat, but there's plenty of room spare.
customer_reviews.author: Angela K.

customer_reviews.title: HAPPY WITH PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great! It is well made and lightweight but heavy enough that it should last a long time. The inside is very roomy; holds my over-length, standard thickness mat as well as two cork blocks which are heavy. There is an inside mesh pocket with zipper for keys, money, etc. and a nice sized outside pocket which holds both my strap and eye pillow with room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: MarteeinMO

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! This was my second purchase after I had to give my last mat bag to a friend because my mat wouldn't fit. This bag hold my extra thick 27" wide mat and my hot yoga towel mat topper comfortably. There's also a handy extra pocket in the front where I stash my phone, keys, wallet and headbands. The bag is sturdy, seems well made, is a really nice vivid pink and the price was reasonable. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Julie S.

customer_reviews.title: Well made bag.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag to store medical sheepskins in. Perfect. It fits two of them. Large and roomy and well made. I would assume that if it's used to keep your Yoga mat and stuff in that you will be pleased.
customer_reviews.author: James W Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Wow! This bag is very nice!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very new to yoga, so I'm about to start going to yoga classes this month, February 2019. Although the product description says "with enough room left for your extras EXCEPT for yoga blocks)", my yoga mat, strap, and blocks fit in this bag just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S. Baines

customer_reviews.title: Space for everything... and then some!
customer_reviews.text: I got this mat because I wanted something with enough room to place my mat and a change of clothes, and this definitely fit the bill! I have a JadeYoga Harmony mat, and I have so much extra room for clothes and a towel. The side pocket is large enough for my mat cleaner, cleaning cloth, keys, large phone AND a stick of deodorant! My coworkers have been asking me about it because I don't have to carry as much as everyone else. I can't recommend this enough. Buy it now!
customer_reviews.author: @sopolysyllabic

customer_reviews.title: Best Yoga Bag for all your Yoga gear
customer_reviews.text: I love this yoga bag! I spent quite a bit of time comparing bags and considering what all they could hold. I have a Gaiam 68x24 5mm mat. I wanted to be able to fit a towel, keys and water bottle in it. Well it can fit that and more. I fit all that plus a pair of running shoes in it. You could probably get a mat, 2 blocks, towel, water bottle and keys/cell phone in there. The outside and inside pockets are great for keys and cell phone. It really is a great bag!!!
customer_reviews.author: Loren Frey

customer_reviews.title: This one is perfect. well made
customer_reviews.text: I use a extra long, thick yoga mat and most carriers do not quite work for me. This one is perfect. well made, but light weight. I like the single, adjustable strap so I can carry it cross body or over the shoulder. I can fit my yoga towel in the front pocket and I carry my phone and wallet in a waist pack, which fits in the bag easily with a water bottle as well, with some room to spare. I like that the zipper spans the length of the bag, easy to get my mat in and out and everything is secure. I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: no name

customer_reviews.title: Great bag.
customer_reviews.text: This bag is plenty big enough for my mat and a towel or possibly 2, I do sweat quite a bit, so very useful to take to the yoga studio.
customer_reviews.author: I. Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a slightly larger and sturdier bag than the norm. I am traveling and I can get two mats rolled together into the bag, which is why I purchased it. Or it has room for one mat with a towel & strap etc. Roomy pockets large enough for phone and keys. If you want something cute to stow one mat in, this is not it. But if you want a little more room, something to travel with, something you know you won't need a purse or that you have a towel handy, or you want to fly with your yoga gear, I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is large enough to hold my two mats. It is very sturdy and not flimsy like other mat bags. I'm pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Great yoga bag
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for the perfect manly yoga bag for my husband and this is it. He goes to hot yoga 2-4 times a week. It's just the right size for yoga mat and yoga towels, keys and even a water bottle. Love it. I think I need one too.
customer_reviews.author: rfarris2

customer_reviews.title: good match for thick yoga mat
customer_reviews.text: I have a Manduka Pro bag (normal size) and it is too big for most yoga mat bags, but this bag fits very well...and has enough room for a towel, and other items. I just received it, so haven't carried it around, but it seems sturdy and well made. I love the color.
customer_reviews.author: L. Ball

customer_reviews.title: The best yoga mat bag
customer_reviews.text: I've looked all over and tried several yoga mat bags before finding this one. The others were not big enough or were difficult to use. This mat is perfect for my needs. It's large enough for my 1/2" mat and if I wanted to put a towel or water bottle in the main compartment, they would fit. The outside pocket expands and would hold quite a few items such as keys, money, credit cards, etc. It was very easy to get my mat in and out of the bag. This is the perfect bag for me.
customer_reviews.author: Wise Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: I received my YogaAddict mat bag yesterday, and I am thoroughly impressed! I was surprised how my Manduka black mat fit perfectly though I had anticipated that the bag would be too saggy or too small, but it fits like a glove. The bag is very comfortable to carry, well constructed, plenty of room for a small towel, keys, wallet, glasses, with room to spare. I've already taken it with me to a couple of yoga classes. Highly recommended, excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: Great bag! It’s big enough to hold all my stuff and the fabric is sturdy. Easy to get my mat in/out of quickly.
customer_reviews.author: detlefsen19@yahoo.com

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice yoga bag however, I would prefer it to be a little bigger. Since I have been using the yoga bag for a few months now I still wish it was a little wider but I have figured out how to rearrange my yoga items (mat, towels, blocks, and straps) and am quite pleased with the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Chance Vallon

customer_reviews.title: Great quality,  stain resistant
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! It holds Matt , small foam roller and 2 water bottles. Outside pocket for phone and other things. I've been using it for a while now and it seems to be very stain resistant and the zippers work great!
customer_reviews.author: Angela lee

customer_reviews.title: Good bag, double check size
customer_reviews.text: I had to return mine because my xl mat didn’t fit, but the bag was nice and would be a solid choice for regular mats
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Good bag to fit all of your yoga stuff
customer_reviews.text: Hands free! I have my gym bag with all my gym stuff in it. Now I have a yoga bag that fits all my yoga gear...my lulu lemon mat, extra towels for the hot yoga classes and there’s still room to spare. Not sure if a yoga block would fit but it’s nice to keep extra pony tail holders, keys, phone, in the two good size pockets. Easy to put mat in and take out of bag. Makes going to yoga class less stressful carrying everything you need
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for mobility.
customer_reviews.text: This easily fits both my towel and my onnit yoga mat. The pockets are large enough for my phone, wallet and keys, and more. I like that the strap is a cotton-like fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Stroup

customer_reviews.title: very nice yoga bag
customer_reviews.text: edit: I've used this bag once, and noticed that the stitching on the zipper handle has already come undone. will be sending for a replacement. downgrading to 4 stars. fits my jade yoga mat nicely, plus lots of room for towels, extra shirts, etc. has a side pocket for keys for easy access. bought the grey one, color looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Michael F Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect....
customer_reviews.text: Large enough for my yoga mat, workout clothes, & sneakers with room to spare! Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: CHadley

customer_reviews.title: Almost a five stars!
customer_reviews.text: I only give it a 4 since if your mat is the maximum size this bag can accommodate (which is my case) it is very difficult to get it in. Too bad the zipper does not go around one of the sides as well, would make this bag a 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: G. Dadush

customer_reviews.title: Very Functional
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made bag. The material is durable and construction is spot on. It fits everything that I need: my 72" yoga mat, a towel for the mat, a personal towel, and my work-out clothes. The little pocket is perfect for a couple of toiletries that I bring with. This way I don't need to carry a purse with me.
customer_reviews.author: IPS

customer_reviews.title: I got in-touch with yoga addict and they had great customer service and immediately sent me a replacement
customer_reviews.text: Original one had an issue with the zipper, can happen to any product, I got in-touch with yoga addict and they had great customer service and immediately sent me a replacement ... This is possibly the best mat bag, enough room for towel and a zippered pocket for keys and money or cards.
customer_reviews.author: AD

customer_reviews.title: Great material and quality
customer_reviews.text: Great material and quality. I did have to order two of these, since the first one came with a broken zipper. But the quality was so amazing that I just ignore the defect on the first one and ordered it again. I absolutely love how it looks, feels, and performs. Definitely a great find and reasonably price.
customer_reviews.author: UnikTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Great Yoga Mat Bag!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these yoga mat bags. They are perfect for taking to the gym for yoga class. We were both able to put our keys, wallets, phones, and yoga blankets all in one bag. The vents in the bag help keep the bag fresh. I love the double zipper feature of this bag. It gives you easy access in and out of bag for transferring the yoga mat in and out. Highly recommend this bag for the YogaAddict!
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Love It! Heavy duty material/Well Made/Lots of Room
customer_reviews.text: Works GREAT! I have a Jade Harmony yoga mat and it fits perfect with room for my towel and a workout outfit! The zipper pocket on the side works perfect to keep my phone, headphones and keys in!! Heavy duty and well-made!
customer_reviews.author: KSMom

customer_reviews.title: Fit Perfect my Mat! Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality and a lot of useful space for your mat and yoga items. I recommended!
customer_reviews.author: andrea pinto

customer_reviews.title: Great little bag very well made and nicely built.
customer_reviews.text: Great bag and very good quality. I used the bag for other things than a Yoga mat. The size was perfect to hold my Metal detector accessory shafts and coils assembled and ready to go along with a few other items. I bet this bag would work great for what it was design for a Yoga mat but I don't do Yoga..Lol. All kidding aside for the money this bag is a dandy whether you use it for a it's intended use or for something else. Great price, great value and fast dilivery. Bill G
customer_reviews.author: Bill G

customer_reviews.title: Roomy and then some.
customer_reviews.text: This mat bag is large enough to hold my oversize yoga mat with enough room left over for gloves, bottle of water, towels etc. It's well made and I'm sure will last forever. I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine M Baker

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, plenty of room
customer_reviews.text: This bag has plenty of room. More than I needed but I'm not considering that a negative. I take this with me one night a week so as long as I have all my stuff together, that's all that matters to me. I have a slightly thicker yoga mat and I could probably include a neatly folded blanket in here for shavasana. The pocket keeps my keys, cell phone, yoga socks and gloves for when I feel like using them and still room for a few more small items.
customer_reviews.author: HappyCat

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed !
customer_reviews.text: Product is light weight and sturdy. It is just what I wanted and is what was advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Beauchamp

customer_reviews.title: This is a great bag. It securely holds my mat and other ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag. It securely holds my mat and other small (and maybe even not-so-small) items. Please note, this is a pretty large bag! If you are a really small person, you might find it to be a bit too much. For my purposes, it's just right because I can put other gym clothes right in with the mat, and everything is conveniently zipped together in one place.
customer_reviews.author: GymGirl

customer_reviews.title: 28”x8” Fits my Manduka pro easily
customer_reviews.text: fit my manduka pro easily, with room to spare for towel water bottle etc. I originally bought the extra large and it was HUGE!! I just wish that the cool gray color I bought in extra large also came in the smaller version, but the blue will work.
customer_reviews.author: Tigresswoods

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this bag
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this bag! It's big enough to fit everything I need for yoga (mat, water, towel, yoga gloves, block covers) with plenty of room left over. It's big, but not too big. The pocket is great for my wallet, cell phone, lip gloss, etc. I got the black one. It's very sturdy with a nice adjustable strap. Everything about it is perfect! And, no, I was not given a free bag in return for my review. It's a great bag at a great price, and the owner of the company really cares about customer satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: KCPhillyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, well made and perfect size. Even for my heavy duty Manduka mat. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Holds everything
customer_reviews.text: Only wished it came in “pretty” colors! Holds my mat, 2 blocks, strap, blanket and small pillow. Keys and phone fit in the outside pocket
customer_reviews.author: Barb Corbett

customer_reviews.title: Easy to carry.
customer_reviews.text: I put two yoga mats and a small rug Rolled up into the carrier. After that I sat on it to put on my sneakers. The side pocket holds cash and Kleenex.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn MallettSmith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: I have the Manduka EKO yoga pilates mat, 71x26. This carrying case fits perfectly. A nice size pocket on the outside and another on the inside. I'm Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Low Price with Good Quality all in one.
customer_reviews.text: Have a very thick yoga mat and it fits if I squish it in. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen DeSa

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product based on the reviews! I really needed a simple yoga bag to carry my matt and my cleaner and towel. I ordered the pink one and it’s so cute and nicely made . I have had it for almost a year now and no problems at all! I would order again and have sent to my friends for a cheaper option then other bags. :)
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Lucas

customer_reviews.title: perfect size for large yoga mats
customer_reviews.text: Great yoga mat bag for Jade or Manduka yoga mats. I have the Jade Fusion extra thick and extra long mat: 74 in long, 24 in wide, and 5/16 in thick. This yoga bag fits my mat, towel, and it still has some room in it too. The two zipper pockets are very useful, one on the outside and a mesh one on the inside. The strap is adjustable and comfortable. I got the red color and it's very nice. The price is great and I would recommend this to all the yogis out there. Great company with excellent customer service too!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the purchase and would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Fits all I need for yoga except the blocks. So many bags are so small that it’s hard to get the mat in.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Namaste
customer_reviews.text: This bag is perfect for my yoga equiptment. I can easily travel with it. Very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: AlliCat

customer_reviews.title: Design meets all of your needs
customer_reviews.text: The mat bag is well designed to accommodate the mat and supplemental items. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: TS - Brooklyn

customer_reviews.title: This bag is the best!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this mat bad for more then a year. I love it! It is simply the best!! It is resistant, it doesn't stink and it has inside enought space for the mat (I have a thin one) the towel for hot yoga, my yoga clothes, a small towel for shower and a small shampoo and conditioner. After more then a year it looks like new. I think this bag will last for long! I'm really happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely wonderful bag. It's large enough for my yoga mat (I could probably fit two!), my towels, bottle of water AND the external pockets are so great for my little items (keys, wallet, etc). This bag is made out of pretty good materials and I expect it to last me a while. Really happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: sidekicksofi

customer_reviews.title: Yoga Addict Yoga mat bag
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bag. Plenty of ventilation. Very sturdy material. Mesh pocket inside is great for your keys or anything personal. I put my mat, my yogi toes mat towel, a hand towel and there s still plenty of room. I also like that it is 28inches long, as it makes putting the mat away very easy. I don't have to roll my mat up super tight to get it in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Pierre L. Ingardia

customer_reviews.title: Fitting and Feeling Good!
customer_reviews.text: Bag barely fits my 1in yoga matt but it works!
customer_reviews.author: Tomkattec

customer_reviews.title: Great workout bag!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is huge. I can store all of my equipment together. Super handy. It is sturdy and I’ve had no issues with the pockets or zippers. Very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Tera Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Very large size, can fit most yoga mats and ...
customer_reviews.text: Very large size, can fit most yoga mats and lots of other stuff too! The little vent holes don't really seem to vent very much since there is a 2nd nylon liner to the bag so I usually unzip it for longer storage.
customer_reviews.author: Mir

customer_reviews.title: I love the adjustable strap too
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this in purple and I'm really loving it! I have the largest Manduka mat, and while it takes a bit of finessing to get it in the bag - it does just make it in. It's so much nicer to carry this large mat in than the strap I had it wrapped in. I find this bag very well made and it is holding up very well. I love the adjustable strap too. I would buy this again and would recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic pockets! Great product.
customer_reviews.text: The pockets (inside and outside) were such a huge plus. So many companies cater to bright neon colors instead of neutral colored yoga bags and accessories. Great, sturdy product! <3
customer_reviews.author: Mal

customer_reviews.title: It is also extremely sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.text: This bag is so spacious I was able to fit two mats, my strap, yoga clothes and shoes in there along with keys, a water bottle and my phone. It is also extremely sturdy and well made. It does not have that newly manufactured smell. NO loose threads. I'm a graduate student with a ton of things to carry everyday, this bag is the best!! I have a black one and it looks great, but more than that it is extremely functional - not to mention these are the best priced yoga bags ever. I love the clean and simple design. Go get yours now!!
customer_reviews.author: Sonia Singh

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I gave the yoga bag to my girlfriend for Christmas. She is really enjoying. Before she had to hand carry a mat, towel, water bottle, purse, keys, etc, into the studio. Obviously there are not enough hand for that! Now she puts it all in the yoga bag and this makes her very happy! Thanks for the great product!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis S

customer_reviews.title: Fits 2 regular sized yoga mats rolled together.
customer_reviews.text: Well made. I wish it had a bigger pocket on the outside. It's hard to fit my wallet and phone into. Also wish it had a handle grip not just the shoulder strap.
customer_reviews.author: happy gardener

customer_reviews.title: Zipper separated right away.
customer_reviews.text: Had an issue with the zipper. It started to separate right away near the back of bag. I advised the seller who requested pictures. I sent them which he said he didn't receive. Very large & holds a lot of things. I still use it. Seems durable.
customer_reviews.author: Meezie

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Bag!!
customer_reviews.text: I received the bag promptly (Prime) and am extremely happy with everything. I love the material, the ventholes and especially the outside/inside pockets. The pockets are what really made the bag stand out to me, as there are many yoga bags similar to this, but the way you have the inside mesh and outside pockets are perfect for carrying towels, straps, etc. Plus, the bag is just large enough to carry my oversized Manduka Pro mat as well as my large eQua towel. Love it. Very sturdy, well made bag. Well worth every cent. 5 Stars. Thank you so much!!
customer_reviews.author: Jason H.

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! I got the purple...great color. I also have a wider and longer mat which fits nicely into the bag...and there is still room for extras. 2 pouches are perfect for my keys, wallet and phone. Bag is comfortable on my shoulder and doesn't slip off. Bag seems well made too. I am so glad I bought this bag! I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Delafield, WI

customer_reviews.title: Nice and roomy
customer_reviews.text: Solve this bag. I have a thicker yoga mat so it is larger than most when rolled up. It fits perfect in this bag with plenty of room for other items if needed. I love the zipper pouch for my keys, phone and wallet if needed. The material is canvas so it should be very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Geri

customer_reviews.title: Fits the thickest of exercise mats
customer_reviews.text: I was unsure if this bag would fully enclose my exercise mat and to my pleasant surprise, it did! Love the adjustable straps and the nice pocket in the front.
customer_reviews.author: April C Evans

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, great value
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag. I ordered the royal blue color. Everything looks and works as expected. Bag is roomier than I thought - in addition to the bag, I can fit a change of clothes and a hand towel. Outside pocket is big enough for phone, keys, and even a small wallet. Also has a small mesh pocket on the inside. Strap is adjustable so you can do over-the-shoulder or crossbody. Would definitely recommend; great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: D. Drew

product_meta.title: YogaAddict Large Yoga Mat Bag and Carriers Compact with Pockets, 28"x8" & 29"x11" Long, Fit Most Mat Size, Extra Wide, Adjustable Strap, Easy Access
feature_bullets: Bag Size: 29" Length x 11" Diameter. (Fits any yoga mat up to 26" wide, with enough room left for your extras EXCEPT for yoga blocks)

EASY TO USE and CONVENIENT TO CARRY AROUND: Adjustable shoulder strap allows you to customize length so you can comfortably move smoothly and easily while walking to yoga class. The design also allow you to keep your hands free while commuting to your favorite fitness studio or gym.

SIMPLE YET BEAUTIFUL: Expandable front compartment gives you enough space for your keys, phone, kindle, books and etc. Zippered outside compartment and a mesh zippered inside pocket for keeping additional items. High quality full zippered closer to easily insert and pull out your mat.
DURABLE with FUNCTIONAL DESIGN: Durable material with ventilation eyelet to allow air flow for the bag and mat to stay fresh, dry and minimize odor.
PREMIUM MATERIAL: Made from the finest, sturdy and light weight fabric: Premium Polyester
